text: Nothaphoebe is a genus of plant in family Lauraceaehttp://www.efloras.org/florataxon.aspx?flora_id=2&taxon;_id=122411http://flora.huh.harvard.edu/china/PDF/PDF07/Nothaphoebe.pdf with about 40 species in East Asia, south east Asia, and North America. Distribution from China to peninsula Malaysia, Sumatra, Java, Lesser Sunda Islands, Borneo, Philippines. In North America from Texas to south with more species mostly in Central America. The wood is used for house building. ==Selected species== It contains the following species, but this list is incomplete: * Nothaphoebe annamensis H.Liu * Nothaphoebe archboldiana C.K.Allen * Nothaphoebe baviensis Lecomte * Nothaphoebe boninensis (Koidz.) Koidz. ex Kamik. * Nothaphoebe canescens Blume * Nothaphoebe cavaleriei (H.Lév.) YenC.Yang * Nothaphoebe condensa Ridl. * Nothaphoebe javanica * Nothaphoebe kingiana Gamble * Nothaphoebe pahangensis Kosterm. * Nothaphoebe umbelliflora (Blume) Blume ==References== Category:Lauraceae Category:Laurales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Nothaphoebe
